name: Lost in the Sea
description:
Top-down 2D survival about a sailor who has lost his ship in a shipwreck and has to salvage the remains to keep his raft afloat, survive dangerous waters and find his way to the shore.

Story Controls
  • move - AWSD or arrows
  • zoom - mouse wheel
  • turn - mouse cursor
  • accelerate - Shift
  • brake - Space

Everything else is explained in the game.

More Screenshots Credits

All the rest of the contents were developed from scratch during the game jam by Mykola Herasymovych.

Tools used:

  • Unity3D
  • Krita
  • FL Studio
  • Audacity
